describe: Croatia is a beautiful country located in Southeast Europe, known for its stunning coastline along the Adriatic Sea, rich history, and vibrant culture. It is a popular tourist destination with a diverse landscape that includes beaches, islands, and mountains.

cities.name: 🏝 Dubrovnik
cities.geographical_location: Southern Croatia on the Adriatic Sea
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters
cities.famous_cuisine: Black risotto, Dubrovnik's rozata, and seafood dishes

cities.name: 🕌 Zagreb
cities.geographical_location: Northwest Croatia, along the Sava River
cities.climate: Continental climate with hot summers and cold winters

cities.name: 🏔 Split
cities.geographical_location: Central Dalmatia, on the eastern shore of the Adriatic Sea
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters
